snippet: Whatever the changes since the days of rampant racism and corruption at the Los Angeles Police Department, an alleged killer’s charges — however unhinged — have struck a chord.
abstract: Charges of departmental corruption and racism in Los Angeles Police Department by former police officer and alleged killer Christopher J Dorner strike a chord; many local black leaders say accusations serve as reminder of past abuses and that some problems in department still remain, despite huge improvements force has undergone over the years.

byline.contributor: Noah Gilbert and Nuran Alteir contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Whatever the changes since the days of rampant racism and corruption at the Los Angeles Police Department, an alleged killer’s charges — however unhinged — have struck a chord.

headline.seo: For Some, Suspect’s Charges of Police Racism Resound
headline.main: Shooting Suspect’s Racism Allegations Resound for Some
headline.print_headline: For Some, Shooting Suspect’s Charges of Police Racism Resound
